title: Is having Professional Tag not allowed on players account/Streamers?
body: Ok so some games in rank or even in normal's i see Pro Tag name like SKT T1, C9, TSM, etc but with different names or just put different symbols with pros name is that an issue since you are copying people name in pro league? Because people are asking "are you so and so" and they reply "yes i am" like they basically posing as them. And those that count for streamer as well ? I'm just curious about all this because sometimes i get excited or i just get so upset that it's not them.

replies.body: We don't really mind players having a tag with their own name, but it may become a problem if they're deliberately trying impersonate someone.  We'll also consider changing it if a specific team asks us to.  If you run into cases like this in a game, be sure to report it so we can take a look at each case individually.  Hope that helps clear some things up!
